docs.lead_paragraph: BAR HARBOR, Me. HERE in this erstwhile blueblood haunt, now tourist haven, is the launching pad for the second stage of the biological revolution. The revolutionaries are mice. Their pad: the Jackson Laboratory.

headline.main: The Mouse Stage Of the New Biology; The mouse stage of the new biology
